required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Continuous Non Invasive Blood Pressure With Adult Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of Continuous Non-Invasive Blood Pressure Monitors With Adult Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: A study to collect data recorded by devices for cNIBP evaluation purposes.

detailed_description.textblock: The study is going to be conducted to collect data from the devices used in the study for future AMS engineering purposes as deemed appropriate by the Sponsor.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, average of one day
primary_outcome.description: To collect data recorded by devices for cNIBP evaluation purposes.

secondary_outcome.measure: Collect number of adverse events (AEs), serious adverse events (SAEs), and device issues
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of one day
secondary_outcome.description: The safety objective is to collect safety information, including type and number of adverse events (AE), serious adverse events (SAE), and device issues.

arm_group.description: this study has only one arm

intervention.intervention_name: measuring blood pressure with noninvasive blood pressure device
intervention.description: To measure blood pressure in different circumstances with noninvasive blood pressure device
